dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: PPC; Portland Pozzolana Cement; Calcined clay cement; Pozzolanic cement; Blended Cement
PPC; Portland Pozzolana Cement; Calcined clay cement; Pozzolanic cement; Blended Cement
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Portland pozzolana cement is a type of cement that is manufactured by integrating pozzolanic materials with Portland cement. It involves processing at a specific level to achieve desired strength and durability, adhering to industry standards. This product flow includes information on the treatment of the cement, compliance with relevant standards, quality measures, and how it is used in construction. Details about the production process and the raw materials (educts) used, such as pozzolana and clinker, are included. It also specifies the product’s status in terms of being a part of a production or consumption mix and indicates the availability location, such as availability to the consumer or at the manufacturing plant.
波特兰掺合火山灰水泥是通过将火山灰材料与波特兰水泥结合制成的一种水泥。它经过特定级别的处理以达到期望的强度和耐久性，并遵守行业标准。该产品流程包括水泥处理信息、符合相关标准、质量措施以及建筑中的使用方式。包含有关生产工艺和所使用的原材料（如火山灰和熟料）的详细信息。它还明确了产品作为生产或消费混合物的状态，并指出了产品的可用地点，例如消费者可用或在制造工厂。
